idea-plugin.name: Trash Panda Theme
idea-plugin.description:
A theme for raccoons and other creatures of the night.

Features

  • Four dark theme variations: Dark (Default), Blacklight (High Contrast), Starlight, Moonlight
  • Two light theme variations: Dawnlight, and Daylight
  • Vibrant Color Scheme: Utilizes a palette of bright, engaging colors to enhance code readability and reduce visual fatigue.
  • Optimized for Scanning: Carefully designed to highlight syntax and structure in order to make it easier to navigate and scan code.
  • Modern, Clean Aesthetic: Offers a minimalist IDE appearance that reduces distractions, allowing you to focus on the code.
  • Compatible with all IntelliJ IDEs: Install this theme on any IntelliJ product
  • Regular Updates: Improvements and fixes are introduced on a regular basis
  • FREE: This plugin will always be free. I use this theme every day and am happy to see that others also enjoy using it.
